game.name: Netoo
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, HDR available
game.shortDescription: Netoo 는 회전 버튼으로 운송 자석을 회전시켜 작은 자석을 올바른 위치에 놓는 미니멀리스트 논리 퍼즐 게임입니다. 10개 레벨마다 새로운 메커니즘이 도입되어 게임의 난이도는 점차 증가합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Netoo is a minimalist logic puzzle where you try to place small magnets into their correct spots by rotating transporter magnets with rotators. The difficulty of the game increases gradually, thanks to new mechanics introduced every 10 levels.
